Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class GodController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.GodController
public class GodController
extends java.lang.Object
Class that implements the God Controller of the GUI of the game.
Since:
1.0

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> playerList, java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.String challengerName)
      Initialize the playerlist and the challenger to setup the Gods.
      Parameters:
      playerList - Variable that represents the list of players in the game.
      nickname - Variable that represents the nickname of the current player.
      challengerName - Variable that represents the nickname of the challenger.

    • gridClicked

      Parameters:

      Parameters:
      god - Variable that represents the god at issue.

    • setCloud

      public void setCloud​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, java.lang.String god)
      Sets the bubble of the God in the GUI of the current client.
      Parameters:
      imageView - Variable that represents the assigned image of the God in JavaFX.
      god - Variable that represents the name of the God.
